"0500-2540800400" and "1602" (01/2016) is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2958647 board]. {{see also|Linksys|U-MEDIA}} ===See also=== [http://www.linksys.com/us/range-extenders/c/wireless-wi-fi-range-extenders/ Wireless Range Extenders]
